title: Senior Designer
description:
You are a talented artist with an entrepreneurial spirit who loves to challenge conventional thinking. You know how to create simple design solutions to complex business challenges and have crafted a standout portfolio along the way. You have honed your decision-making and client-facing skills over the years and are ready to lead.

In this role, you will mentor other designers and take a lead role on projects, working collaboratively across disciplines. You must possess the confidence and critical ability necessary to sign off on deliverables and make decisions that lead to a great product for each client.

We work with clients of all sizes and outfits, so your designs must be adaptable as well as inspiring. Solid organizational and communication skills, collaboration across departments, and the pursuit of new challenges will be crucial to your success at Smashing Boxes.
lookingFor:
• A standout portfolio that tells a story about your work and career progression
  • An inspired vision coupled with an eagerness to showcase it to the outside world
  • Excellent client-facing and collaboration skills - you must be persuasive, well-spoken, and a solid verbal and written communicator
  • Digital experience in UI design for both web and mobile
  • Strong experience and ability in visual design, art direction, interaction design, and branding
  • Agency experience
  • Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript
  • Experience/skill in photography, illustration, animation, and UX design is a plus
